entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:03 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 02:34 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
